tips.title: Fokus ke 1 tim inti
tips.description: Prioritaskan 4 operator utama (DPS, sub-DPS, support, sustain) sampai progression stabil.

tips.title: Naikkan level senjata lebih dulu
tips.description: Dampak upgrade weapon biasanya terasa lebih cepat dibanding menaikkan banyak karakter sekaligus.

tips.title: Ikuti skill priority
tips.description: Jangan rata semua skill. Ikuti prioritas tiap karakter agar material tidak boros.

tips.title: Siapkan coverage elemen
tips.description: Minimal punya 2 elemen damage aktif agar lebih fleksibel lawan musuh di stage berbeda.

tips.title: Jangan abaikan AIC dan logistik
tips.description: Sistem industri dan energi memengaruhi farming jangka panjang. Stabilkan produksi dari awal.

tips.title: Rutinkan login + event harian
tips.description: Resource event launch biasanya paling efisien untuk account baru, terutama upgrade material.

tips.title: Latihan rotasi di boss fight
tips.description: Timing combo, skill cancel, dan burst window jauh lebih penting di konten boss ketimbang auto-spam.

tips.title: Simpan currency untuk banner target
tips.description: Hindari impuls pull. Simpan resource untuk unit yang benar-benar menguatkan core team kamu.

characters.name: Laevatain
characters.summary: Burst damage tinggi dan konsisten untuk jadi carry utama tim.

build.weapon: Dawn's Last Glimmer / Daybreak Caller / Straight Away
build.skills: Talent > Active Skill > Ultimate > Basic Attack > Combo Skill
build.notes: Fokuskan uptime buff sebelum buka burst window.

intro: Laevatain is a Striker in Arknights Endfields. Laevatain is a Heat character which equips with Sword.

Laevatain is a Rhodes Island Operator assigned to Endfield Industries where she serves as a specialist operator following the framework agreement between the two companies. With Warfarin's authorization, Laevatain once spent years in the north to carry out a solo field mission, thanks to her strong skills in independent operations.
storyHighlights: Laevatain is a Striker in Arknights Endfields. Laevatain is a Heat character which equips with Sword.

Laevatain is a Rhodes Island Operator assigned to Endfield Industries where she serves as a specialist operator following the framework agreement between the two companies. With Warfarin's authorization, Laevatain once spent years in the north to carry out a solo field mission, thanks to her strong skills in independent operations.
profile.playstyle: Mainkan Laevatain sebagai striker heat. Buka rotasi dengan skill pemicu tim, lalu masuk ke jendela burst saat buff aktif.

skills.name: Flaming Cinders
skills.description: An attack with up to 5 sequences that deals Heat DMG. As the controlled operator, Final Strike also deals 18 Stagger.
skills.usage: Gunakan untuk isi Stagger/SP sambil menunggu jendela combo tim.

skills.name: Seethe
skills.description: When an enemy suffers Combustion or Corrosion.Fire erupts beneath the feet of any enemy with Combustion or Corrosion, dealing Heat DMG to them.If the skill hits the enemy, Laevatain gains 1 stack of Melting Flame and further gains Ultimate Energy per enemy hit.
skills.usage: Aktifkan setelah syarat trigger terpenuhi agar damage dan utility maksimal.

skills.name: Scorching Heart
skills.description: After the controlled operator's Final Strike or Finisher hits the enemy, Laevatain absorbs Heat Infliction from nearby enemies.Every stack of Heat Infliction absorbed gives Laevatain 1 stack of Melting Flame (max stacks: 4).After reaching 4 stacks, DMG dealt by Laevatain ignores {100*ignore_fire_resist:0} Heat Resistance of the enemy for 20s.Laevatain also absorbs Heat Infliction from enemies defeated nearby.
skills.usage: Prioritaskan upgrade talent saat core rotation tim sudah stabil.

characters.name: Gilberta
characters.summary: Buffer kuat dengan kontribusi damage tinggi di komposisi burst.

build.weapon: Return to Arcadia / Daybreak Caller / Rocket Belt
build.skills: Talent > Active Skill > Ultimate > Basic Attack > Combo Skill
build.notes: Sinkronkan skill dengan main DPS agar buff tidak terbuang.

intro: Gilberta is a Support in Arknights Endfields. Gilberta is a Nature character which equips with Arts Unit.

Gilberta, serves as a Rhodes Island liaison based at Endfield Industries. Fans of the earlier Arknights game may recognize her. Proficient in the uncommon gravity facet of Originium Arts, she has played a pivotal role in supporting numerous crucial projects across different divisions.
storyHighlights: Gilberta is a Support in Arknights Endfields. Gilberta is a Nature character which equips with Arts Unit.

Gilberta, serves as a Rhodes Island liaison based at Endfield Industries. Fans of the earlier Arknights game may recognize her. Proficient in the uncommon gravity facet of Originium Arts, she has played a pivotal role in supporting numerous crucial projects across different divisions.
profile.playstyle: Mainkan Gilberta sebagai support nature. Buka rotasi dengan skill pemicu tim, lalu masuk ke jendela burst saat buff aktif.

skills.name: Arcane Staff: Beam Cohesion Arts
skills.description: An attack with up to 4 sequences that deals Nature DMG. As the controlled operator, Final Strike also deals 16 Stagger.
skills.usage: Gunakan untuk isi Stagger/SP sambil menunggu jendela combo tim.

skills.name: Arcane Staff: Matrix Displacement
skills.description: When an Arts Reaction is applied to an enemy.A quick casting of the Arts that generates a gravity pull, which then deals Nature DMG and forcibly Lifts the target and nearby enemies.
skills.usage: Aktifkan setelah syarat trigger terpenuhi agar damage dan utility maksimal.

skills.name: Messenger's Song
skills.description: When fighting in the battlefield, all allied guards, casters, and supporters gain Ultimate Gain Efficiency +4%.
skills.usage: Prioritaskan upgrade talent saat core rotation tim sudah stabil.

characters.name: Yvonne
characters.summary: DPS fleksibel dengan scaling kuat dari early ke endgame.

build.weapon: Daybreak Caller / Old Times in Londinium / Matcha
build.skills: Talent > Basic Attack > Active Skill > Combo Skill > Ultimate
build.notes: Utamakan rotasi basic + skill untuk damage stabil.

intro: Yvonne is a Caster in Arknights Endfields. Yvonne is a Cryo character which equips with Handcannon.
storyHighlights: Yvonne is a Caster in Arknights Endfields. Yvonne is a Cryo character which equips with Handcannon.
Yvonne punya kontribusi penting dalam operasi Endfield berdasarkan sumber komunitas.
profile.playstyle: Mainkan Yvonne sebagai caster cryo. Buka rotasi dengan skill pemicu tim, lalu masuk ke jendela burst saat buff aktif.

skills.name: Exuberant Trigger
skills.description: An attack with up to 5 sequences that deals Cryo DMG. As the controlled operator, Final Strike also deals 17 Stagger.
skills.usage: Gunakan untuk isi Stagger/SP sambil menunggu jendela combo tim.

skills.name: Flashfreezer u37
skills.description: When the controlled operator performs a Final Strike on an enemy with Solidification.Immediately deploys Frost-e-Bytee next to the enemy. While active, Frost-e-Bytee constantly releases energy to attack nearby enemies, deals Cryo DMG to them, and pulls them towards itself. After Frost-e-Bytee expires, it explodes to forcibly apply Solidification and deal Cryo DMG to nearby enemies.After the combo skill successfully hits the enemy, Yvonne gains additional Ultimate Energy. This Ultimate Energy Gain effect can only trigger 1 time, even if the skill hits multiple enemies.
skills.usage: Aktifkan setelah syarat trigger terpenuhi agar damage dan utility maksimal.

skills.name: Barrage of Technology
skills.description: Battle skill Brr-Brr-Bomb β improved: After applying Solidification, the next basic attack performed becomes a Final Strike.
skills.usage: Prioritaskan upgrade talent saat core rotation tim sudah stabil.

characters.name: Ardelia
characters.summary: Support premium untuk menjaga tempo tim dan memaksimalkan output.

build.weapon: Return to Arcadia / Old Times in Londinium / Seashell
build.skills: Talent > Active Skill > Ultimate > Basic Attack > Combo Skill
build.notes: Jaga posisi dan timing utility agar tim tetap aman saat burst.

intro: Ardelia is a Support in Arknights Endfields. Ardelia is a Nature character which equips with Arts Unit.
Ardelia, serves as a Rhodes Island operator assigned to Endfield Industries where she serves as an expert geologist under the framework agreement between the two companies.
storyHighlights: Ardelia is a Support in Arknights Endfields. Ardelia is a Nature character which equips with Arts Unit.
Ardelia, serves as a Rhodes Island operator assigned to Endfield Industries where she serves as an expert geologist under the framework agreement between the two companies.
profile.playstyle: Mainkan Ardelia sebagai support nature. Buka rotasi dengan skill pemicu tim, lalu masuk ke jendela burst saat buff aktif.

skills.name: Rocky Whispers
skills.description: An attack with up to 4 sequences that deals Nature DMG. As the controlled operator, Final Strike also deals 18 Stagger.
skills.usage: Gunakan untuk isi Stagger/SP sambil menunggu jendela combo tim.

skills.name: Eruption Column
skills.description: When the controlled operator performs a Final Strike on an enemy with no stacks of Vulnerability or Arts Infliction.Launches a homing Volcanic Cloud at a target enemy that deals Nature DMG when close enough to the target. The Volcanic Cloud explodes after a short delay, dealing half of the Nature DMG and forcibly applying temporary Corrosion to nearby enemies
skills.usage: Aktifkan setelah syarat trigger terpenuhi agar damage dan utility maksimal.

skills.name: Friendly Presence
skills.description: The battle skill Dolly Rush creates 3 Shadows of Mr. Dolly after hitting the enemy. The copies of Mr. Dolly scattered by the ultimate Wooly Party also have a 10% chance to create Shadows of Mr. Dolly when they fall to the ground. When the controlled operator touches a Shadow of Mr. Dolly, Ardelia restores the said operator's HP by [45 + Will×0.38].If the controlled operator is already at max HP, then restore the HP of the teammate with lowest percentage HP.Shadows of Mr. Dolly last for 10s and up to 10 can exist in the battlefield.
skills.usage: Prioritaskan upgrade talent saat core rotation tim sudah stabil.

characters.name: Last Rite
characters.summary: DPS agresif dengan potensi clear cepat untuk konten padat musuh.

build.weapon: High ATK Great Weapon / Return to Arcadia
build.skills: Talent > Active Skill > Ultimate > Combo Skill > Basic Attack
build.notes: Buka skill saat musuh terkumpul untuk value maksimum.

intro: Last Rite is a Striker in Arknights Endfields. Last Rite is a Cryo character which equips with Great Sword.

Last Rite, Before the Sarkaz of the floating city found her, Last Rite was a kind-hearted girl adopted by a Caprinae gravekeeper couple. Shaped by their teachings, the young Nachzehrer refused to disturb the dead, resisting her instinct to feed. But that restraint left her reeling with hunger, and her insecurity made her shrink away from others.
storyHighlights: Last Rite is a Striker in Arknights Endfields. Last Rite is a Cryo character which equips with Great Sword.

Last Rite, Before the Sarkaz of the floating city found her, Last Rite was a kind-hearted girl adopted by a Caprinae gravekeeper couple. Shaped by their teachings, the young Nachzehrer refused to disturb the dead, resisting her instinct to feed. But that restraint left her reeling with hunger, and her insecurity made her shrink away from others.
profile.playstyle: Mainkan Last Rite sebagai striker cryo. Buka rotasi dengan skill pemicu tim, lalu masuk ke jendela burst saat buff aktif.

skills.name: Dance of Rime
skills.description: An attack with up to 4 sequences that deals Cryo DMG. As the controlled operator, Final Strike also deals 25 Stagger.
skills.usage: Gunakan untuk isi Stagger/SP sambil menunggu jendela combo tim.

skills.name: Winter's Devourer
skills.description: When an enemy has 3 or more Cryo Infliction stacks.Encases the target enemy in icicles and shatters them to consume all Cryo Infliction stacks of the said enemy. The number of Cryo Infliction stacks consumed determines the amount of Cryo DMG dealt to the said enemy and Ultimate Energy gained by Last Rite.
skills.usage: Aktifkan setelah syarat trigger terpenuhi agar damage dan utility maksimal.

skills.name: Hypothermia
skills.description: After Last Rite consumes any Arts Infliction, she applies Cryo Susceptibility to the target with the effect of [Number of Arts Infliction stacks consumed × 2%] for 15s. This effect cannot stack.
skills.usage: Prioritaskan upgrade talent saat core rotation tim sudah stabil.

build.skills: Talent > Active Skill > Ultimate > Combo Skill > Basic Attack

intro: Perlica is a Caster in Arknights Endfields. Perlica is a Electric character which equips with Arts Unit.

As the Supervisor at Endfield Industries, she adeptly navigates company resources. A disciplined and approachable leader, she engenders anticipation among operators to join her team, known for its attractive incentives such as bonuses, ample leave days, and continuous learning opportunities during assignments.

build.skills: Talent > Active Skill > Ultimate > Combo Skill > Basic Attack
build.notes: Pakai saat perlu transisi damage antarelemen.

intro: Ember is a Defender in Arknights Endfields. Ember is a Heat character which equips with Great Sword.

Ember, a Tank character in the current game lineup, stands out as a remarkable warrior with extensive combat expertise and a knack for military strategies. While she excels in battle, Ember struggles with everyday communication, prompting caution among fellow Endfield members to communicate with her sensitively to prevent any misunderstandings.
storyHighlights: Ember is a Defender in Arknights Endfields. Ember is a Heat character which equips with Great Sword.

intro: Avywenna is a Striker in Arknights Endfields. Avywenna is a Electric character which equips with Polearm.

Avywenna is widely recognized as an Armed Messenger on the frontier. With extensive experience traversing the rugged terrain, she navigates the wildlands adeptly, shuttling between the frontier and the Civilization Band. A seasoned warrior, Avywenna joined Endfield on the endorsement of the company's longstanding recruitment associate.
storyHighlights: Avywenna is a Striker in Arknights Endfields. Avywenna is a Electric character which equips with Polearm.

build.skills: Talent > Active Skill > Combo Skill > Ultimate > Basic Attack

intro: Da Pan is a Striker in Arknights Endfields. Da Pan is a Physical character which equips with Great Sword.

Da Pan carries a special bottle with him wherever he goes. It doesn't look like anything special to most people, but anyone familiar with the writing of Yan would wonder about its origins. However, if that person happens to be from Hongshan, they would immediately recognize its origins and significance, because they know very well that the bottle is an item of honor only awarded to "major contributors to science".
storyHighlights: Da Pan is a Striker in Arknights Endfields. Da Pan is a Physical character which equips with Great Sword.

Da Pan carries a special bottle with him wherever he goes. It doesn't look like anything special to most people, but anyone familiar with the writing of Yan would wonder about its origins. However, if that person happens to be from Hongshan, they would immediately recognize its origins and significance, because they know very well that the bottle is an item of honor only awarded to "major contributors to science".

skills.name: Reduce and Thicken

skills.usage: Prioritaskan upgrade talent saat core rotation tim sudah stabil.

Catcher, serves on Operations Team Z7 in Endfield, responsible for cover and logistical support. Backed by full military training, he draws on his extensive knowledge to guide his teammates through critical moments.

intro: Arclight is a Vanguard in Arknights Endfields. Arclight is a Electric character which equips with Sword.

Arclight is a scabhta of the Fiannæ Circuit. She is currently partnering with Endfield Industries as a technical consultant. No one roaming the wildlands could escape the grip of starvation and disasters, no matter how clever or capable they may think themselves to be. Misfortune struck Arclight hard. The wildlands consumed her entire family, leaving her the only survivor.
storyHighlights: Arclight is a Vanguard in Arknights Endfields. Arclight is a Electric character which equips with Sword.

intro: Lifeng is a Guard in Arknights Endfields. Lifeng is a Physical character which equips with Polearm.

Lifeng is a member of Wuling City Guards who currently interns at the Specialist Tech Division of Endfield Industries. When he was little, Lifeng had a happy family like other kids in Wuling. However ... a horrific incident crushed his arm and took the lives of his parents. The less-than-10-year-old boy had no choice but to mature quickly. He accepted a prosthetic arm and poured effort into every step of his recovery.
storyHighlights: Lifeng is a Guard in Arknights Endfields. Lifeng is a Physical character which equips with Polearm.

build.team: Snowshine + Perlica + sub DPS + main DPS
build.notes: Dipakai saat stage butuh survivability tambahan.

intro: Snowshine is a Defender in Arknights Endfields. Snowshine is a Cryo character which equips with Great Sword.

Snowshine is a Rhodes Island operator under the direct command of Director Warfarin of Rhosed Island Pharmaceuticals Incorporated. Snowshin had jointly carried out multiple search and rescue (WAR) missions with Endfield Industries and solved many technical issues as an SAR profesional. Snowshin is currently working at Endfield Industries as a Rhodes Island SAR specialist and liaison.
storyHighlights: Snowshine is a Defender in Arknights Endfields. Snowshine is a Cryo character which equips with Great Sword.

Snowshine is a Rhodes Island operator under the direct command of Director Warfarin of Rhosed Island Pharmaceuticals Incorporated. Snowshin had jointly carried out multiple search and rescue (WAR) missions with Endfield Industries and solved many technical issues as an SAR profesional. Snowshin is currently working at Endfield Industries as a Rhodes Island SAR specialist and liaison.
profile.playstyle: Mainkan Snowshine sebagai defender cryo. Buka rotasi dengan skill pemicu tim, lalu masuk ke jendela burst saat buff aktif.

skills.name: Hypothermic Assault
skills.description: An attack with up to 3 sequences that deals Physical DMG. As the controlled operator, Final Strike also deals 23 Stagger.
skills.usage: Gunakan untuk isi Stagger/SP sambil menunggu jendela combo tim.

skills.name: Polar Rescue
skills.description: After controlled operator gets attacked and drops below 60% HP.Snowshine throws a Snowfield SAR Assistant at the controlled operator. Upon target contact, the Assistant gives massive instant HP Treatment to nearby operators as well as continuous HP Treatment to operators in the area of effect.The attribute of Will increases the amount of HP treatment.
skills.usage: Aktifkan setelah syarat trigger terpenuhi agar damage dan utility maksimal.

skills.name: Polar Survival
skills.description: When Snowshine is present, for every surviving Defender in the team, team gains DEF +5%.
skills.usage: Prioritaskan upgrade talent saat core rotation tim sudah stabil.
